rows.name: example_1
rows.comments:
Trigger reprocessing of templates that were initially processed on startup

(Note - can be used with any template, not just startup templates)

rows.name: trigger_1
rows.action_list:
click | process_template: example_startup_1;
click | emit: force_reprocess;
rows.comments:
Trigger the reprocessing of template example_startup_1
(which is also automatically processed on startup)

As we want to display the reprocessed variable in this template also call force_reprocess

rows.name: trigger_2
rows.action_list:
click | process_template: example_startup_2;
click | emit: force_reprocess;
